verbose_text: Taken together, these data suggest that PP1-12 protects cardiomyocytes from TM- and I/R induced apoptosis, and this effect is achieved at least in part through the inhibition of cell apoptosis and the induction of eIF2alpha phosphorylation.
evidence: PP1-12 protects cardiomyocytes from TM- and I/R-induced apoptosis
